languages.text: {n}Обоняние щекочет невероятно сладкий аромат фруктов, особенно яркий после многих часов, проведенных во влажной духоте. Однако найдя источник запаха, Вольный Торговец не решается попробовать дивные фрукты: под плодовыми деревьями лежат мумии со следами страшных мук на иссушенных лицах, а тела их покрыты почерневшими круглыми ранами, похожими на укусы гигантских пиявок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Обоняние щекочет невероятно сладкий аромат фруктов, особенно яркий после многих часов, проведенных во влажной духоте. Однако найдя источник запаха, Вольный Торговец не решается попробовать дивные фрукты: под плодовыми деревьями лежат мумии со следами страшных мук на иссушенных лицах, а тела их покрыты почерневшими круглыми ранами, похожими на укусы гигантских пиявок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обоняние щекочет невероятно сладкий аромат фруктов, особенно яркий после многих часов, проведенных во влажной духоте. Однако найдя источник запаха, Вольный Торговец не решается попробовать дивные фрукты: под плодовыми деревьями лежат мумии со следами страшных мук на иссушенных лицах, а тела их покрыты почерневшими круглыми ранами, похожими на укусы гигантских пиявок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases their sense of smell, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, the Rogue Trader decides against the taste test of the lovely fruits: under the fruit trees happen to lie several mummified corpses, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds similar to the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

{n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El irresistible aroma dulzón de la fruta estimula el sentido del olfato de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, sobre todo después de pasar tantas horas en la sofocante humedad del bosque. Pero tras localizar el origen del olor, decide no degustar los apetitosos frutos: al pie de los árboles frutales yacen varios cadáveres momificados, con los rostros marchitos contraídos en una mueca de agonía y el cuerpo lleno de oscuras llagas que parecen los mordiscos de sanguijuelas gigantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El irresistible aroma dulzón de la fruta estimula su sentido del olfato, sobre todo después de pasar tantas horas en la sofocante humedad del bosque. Pero tras localizar el origen del olor, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente decide no probar los apetitosos frutos: al pie de sus árboles yacen varios cadáveres momificados, con los rostros marchitos contraídos en una mueca de agonía y el cuerpo lleno de oscuras llagas similares a mordiscos de sanguijuelas gigantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}森林中散发着仿佛果香一般的甜美香气，不断挑逗着行商浪人的嗅觉。探险队在潮湿闷热的森林里待了很久，几乎无法抗拒这股香气。不过，当行商浪人发现了香气的源头之后，{mf|他|她}决定不去品尝那些诱人的水果，因为果树下躺着几具干尸，它们干枯的脸痛苦地扭曲着，全身覆满了黑色的伤口，仿佛被巨型水蛭叮咬过一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}森林中散发着仿佛果香一般的甜美香气，不断挑逗着探索队的嗅觉。探险队在潮湿闷热的森林里待了很久，几乎无法抗拒这股香气。不过，当行商浪人发现了香气的源头之后，决定不去品尝那些诱人的水果，因为果树下好巧不巧地躺着几具干尸。它们干枯的脸痛苦地扭曲着，全身覆满了黑色的伤口，仿佛被巨型水蛭叮咬过一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'arôme irrésistiblement sucré des fruits chatouille les narines {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, surtout après tant d'heures passées dans l'humidité étouffante de la forêt. Cependant, après avoir trouvé la source de l'odeur, {mf|il|elle} décide de ne pas céder à la tentation : sous les arbres fruitiers gisent plusieurs cadavres momifiés. Leurs visages flétris témoignent encore des souffrances de leurs derniers instants et leurs corps sont couverts de blessures sombres semblables aux morsures de sangsues géantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arôme irrésistiblement sucré des fruits chatouille les narines {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, surtout après tant d'heures passées dans l'humidité étouffante de la forêt. Cependant, après avoir trouvé la source de l'odeur, {mf|il|elle} décide de ne pas céder à la tentation : sous les arbres fruitiers gisent plusieurs cadavres momifiés. Leurs visages flétris témoignent encore des souffrances de leurs derniers instants et leurs corps sont couverts de blessures sombres semblables aux morsures de sangsues géantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フルーツのたまらなく甘い香りは、特に森の蒸し暑い湿気の中で何時間も過ごした後では自由開拓者の嗅覚を強く刺激するものだった。しかし、香りの発生源を突き止めた後、自由開拓者はこの美しい果物の味見を断念した。果物の木の下にはミイラ化した死体が何体も横たわっていたのだ。その枯れ果てた顔は苦悩の証であり、体は巨大なヒルに噛まれたような黒い傷で覆われていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フルーツのたまらなく甘い香りは、特に森の蒸し暑い湿気の中で何時間も過ごした後では自由開拓者の嗅覚を強く刺激するものだった。しかし、香りの発生源を突き止めた後、自由開拓者はこの美しい果物の味見を断念した。果物の木の下にはミイラ化した死体が何体も横たわっていたのだ。その枯れ果てた顔は苦悩の証であり、体は巨大なヒルに噛まれたような黒い傷で覆われていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das unwiderstehlich süße Aroma von Obst reizt den Geruchssinn {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, besonders nach so vielen Stunden in der drückenden Schwüle des Waldes. Doch nachdem {mf|er|sie} den Ursprung des Aromas entdeckt hat, beschließt {mf|er|sie}, die appetitlichen Früchte besser nicht zu kosten, da unter den Obstbäumen mehrere mumifizierte Leichen liegen, deren verwitterte Gesichter von ihren Qualen berichten. Die Körper sind mit dunklen Wunden übersät, die den Bissen riesiger Egel gleichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das unwiderstehlich süße Aroma von Obst betört den Geruchssinn, besonders nach so vielen Stunden in der schweren Schwüle des Waldes. Doch nachdem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Ursprung des Aromas entdeckt hat, beschließt {mf|er|sie}, die süßen Früchte lieber nicht zu essen: Unter den Obstbäumen liegen mehrere mumifizierte Leichen, deren verwitterte Gesichter von ihren Qualen berichten. Die Körper sind mit dunklen Wunden übersät, ähnlich den Bissen riesiger Egel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Meyvelerin karşı konulmaz derecedeki tatlı aroması, ormanın bunaltıcı nemli atmosferinde bu denli uzun saatler geçirmesinin ardından Hür Tacir'in koku hissinin peşini bırakmıyor. Ancak Hür Tacir, aromanın kaynağını keşfettiğinde iştah açıcı meyveleri denememeye karar veriyor. Meyve ağaçlarının altında mumyaya dönmüş pek çok ceset yatıyor. Kuruyup gitmiş yüzleri, çektikleri eziyeti kanıtlar nitelikte. Bedenleri, devasa sülüklerin ısırığını andıran koyu renkli yaralarla kaplanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The irresistibly sweet aroma of fruit teases the Rogue Trader's olfactory senses, especially after so many hours spent in the stuffy humidity of the forest. But after locating the source of the aroma, {mf|he|she} decides against tasting the appetising fruits: several mummified corpses lie under the fruit trees, their withered faces a testament to their agony, their bodies covered in dark wounds resembling the bites of giant leeches.{/n}
